author: Elizabeth Gilmore
comment: Cannot get the free ones to load to my watch. Not going spend money and STILL not get one to load!

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: Do you have chosen Watchface Designs as watchface on watch first? Do you have a bluetooth connection while set a watchface on mobile app? For further support write an email to support@wearable-software.com

title: even after updating...

author: Michael Krogh
comment: Ordered a watch face, but another got installed.  Wanted to refund, but that wasn't possible 😕 so be aware... No refund possible...

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: We can make a refund. Please write to support@wearable-software.com. Which one did you buy? Are you sure you had a poper bluetooth connection to watch while you changed your watchface selection on phone? Review again. Thank you.

title: Ordered a watch face and got the wrong one installed

author: Sam Aercy
comment: I went for the subscription and now looking at the collection of faces (barely 20 in numbers), I think I just wasted my money

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: We will add continously new Watchfaces and you get them for free! So you don't waste your money. Please review again. Thank you.
